rules.description: Caps Lock to Escape (not in SpaceFN mode)
Map 'Task View' key (F2 key) to launching 'Mission Control.app'
Map 'Desktop Left' key (F3 key) to 'Move left a space' action
Map 'Desktop Right' key (F4 key) to 'Move right a space' action
Map 'Connect' key (F7 key) to launching 'Screen Sharing.app'
Map 'Windows Settings' key (F8 key) to launching 'System Preferences.app'
Map 'Back' mouse button to 'Mission Control.app' action
Toggle 'NumLock' and map action keys on Numpad

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "üî¢ Numeric keys are now active." with title "NumLock enabled" sound name "Tink"'
osascript -e 'display notification "‚ÜîÔ∏è Actions keys are now active." with title "NumLock disabled" sound name "Tink"'

rules.description: SpaceFN: Space+[hjkl] to Left, Down, Up, Right
SpaceFN: Space+u to Home, Space+o to End
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
